Back to Robert Schumann

Robert Schumann

Fugen und Kanons, Anh. F19

c. 1832–1833

Total duration: 11'

  • 1. Fugue in D minor
  • 2. Fugue in G major
  • 3. Fugue in C minor
  • 4. Fugue in A minor
  • 5. Fugue in C-sharp minor
  • 6. Fugue in F-sharp minor
  • 7. Canon in F minor
  • 8. Canon in A-flat major (An Alexis)

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/1,2 · RSA 1016-20 · ed. Timo Evers [no. 3, sketch]
  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/7 · RSA 1022 [in preparation] [no. 8]
  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · VII/3/3,1 · RSA 1059 [in preparation]

1. Fugue in D minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Fugue in G major

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3

3. Fugue in C minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 4.5

4. Fugue in A minor

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

5. Fugue in C-sharp minor

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

6. Fugue in F-sharp minor

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 4

7. Canon in F minor

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

8. Canon in A-flat major (An Alexis)

This canon is based on the song An Alexis send’ ich dich by Friedrich Heinrich Himmel.

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5
